confirmationModal.message: Are you sure you want to permanently clear all snippets in the recycle bin? This action cannot be undone.
confirmationModal.title: Confirm Deletion

recycleSnippetStorage.description: Snippets in the recycle bin will be permanently deleted after 30 days

error.clear: Failed to clear recycle bin. Please try again.

info.noSnippets: No snippets in the recycle bin to clear

success.clear: All snippets in the recycle bin are cleared
